totalFishCaught.description: The total number of fish caught by the player.

totalMoneyMade.description: The total amount of money made by the player.

hoursSpentFishing.description: The total number of hours spent fishing by the player.

moneyMadeFromInterest.description: The total amount of money made from interest by the player.

timesGottenDrunk.description: The total number of times the player has gotten drunk.

moneyLostFromGambling.description: The total amount of money lost from gambling by the player.
